website_summaries.verdict: Choose this set if you are looking for hard-shell suitcases with an ultra-modern design.
pros: An attractive 3-piece hard-shell set with sleek, modern looking construction
Interior of each suitcase is lined for added protection, and features separate mesh pockets
cons: Some durability complaints that include broken zippers and wheels

customer_reviews.title: Durable set!
customer_reviews.text: I was very picky in finding the right luggage set for myself and family. We recently went on a trip to Disney for a week and this luggage survived! Wheels in tact and everything. My kids had the two small bags and my husband and I shared the big one. Very roomy and spacious I must say! They did have little scuff marks here and there on the front and side from being handled by the baggage handlers, but it can easily be rubbed off. I HIGHLY recommended this luggage set. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nandi

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage other than that
customer_reviews.text: wheel broke on first trip-vendor did give a partial refund. I could not return only one of the suitcases for replacement-would have to return entire set. Too much hassle. Nice luggage other than that. Vendor good to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in color
customer_reviews.text: I like the luggage, but I ordered the ice blue. It is definitely green - not blue. If I had time, I would return it and get another color, but I'm using it this week for a business trip.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry P.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new luggage
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SET! Color is a rich wine red. Looks luxurious. Can’t wait to use them. Price is excellent. Haven’t used them yet, but they seem very sturdy. Shipped double boxed. Not a scratch on them
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Kuhl

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and very easy handling
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my adult son who loves them. The spinner wheels allow freedom of movement around corners, running through the airport or parking lot and are very light weight. The construction inside allows for packing a variety of items in a variety of ways to keep your things separated and organized. We have a similar set from this company and LOVE them. Delivery was on time and nicely packaged to avoid damage to the suitcases. Would recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Loretta B

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable - broke on first trip
customer_reviews.text: While the suitcases lasted, they were nice! Lightweight structure, decent interior, moved easily. Unfortunately, I got to enjoy these for all of an hour before they began to fall apart. Wheel came off, leaving the largest one rendered useless while we were half-way across the country. Not reliable, yet they are pretty. Note weights of each [packed] suitcase during their first (and last) trip: Large - 38 pounds Medium - 30 pounds Small - 17 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but fragile
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and ability of these suitcases to move. But they mark so easily. I have only taken them on 2 trips and already they are completely scratched and discolored. Someone saw my suitcase and said I must travel a lot. The TSA lock works well because they were able to search by suitcase and lock it back without issue. Overall not bad and look pretty, but if you're looking for something to hold up long term I would keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Frerich

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for a trip to Mexico. There was more room than I expected. I used the 24” as checked luggage. It held a weeks worth of clothes with room left over. I didn’t even need the 20” carry on. The blue was just as pictured. I love this set.
customer_reviews.author: susan ryan

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight with good storage capacity
customer_reviews.text: This set was exactly what I sought. An easy to maneuver, lightweight but durable set of luggage for travel. I took it on a recent trip. The shell did get scratched but not terribly so. The large case held multiple pairs of shoes for hiking, running, and general wear as well as multiple sets of clothing for those activities along with toiletry items and more. There is storage on both the top half and the bottom half of the case along with a zippered middle where you can place flat items. For the price, I felt this was a good set!
customer_reviews.author: A fan in Indianapolis

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this luggage to anybody!
customer_reviews.text: The color isn’t exactly as it shows. However I do like this luggage it seems strong well put together. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: I love the color.
customer_reviews.text: This luggage is gorgeous in my opinion. Appears to be well made/ sturdy. I purchased it as a gift, so other than a testament to it's appearance, which I really like.. the verdict is out . But I will probably purchase a set for myself.. same color.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Color looks different
customer_reviews.text: The actual color didn't apprear as shiny/pale as the picture, more solid and smoky blue green. During my international trip, the luggage went through six different air planes in one round trip, and its surface got unavoidable stains and scars, but well protected. Also, it is light and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Yuki

customer_reviews.title: Loving so far
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace my skate bag, used daily to carry figure skates and skate essentials to the rink and back. Moves very easily, wheels never get stuck. Arrived in great condition but be careful of the paper tags on the front. There is a perforated tear line tucked under the lining, these are seen into a seam so use caution to remove. Pull the seam up before tearing the tag off or it rips and leaves paper pieces sticking out. They do scuff and scratch if enough pressure is applied but it doesn't show unless you look VERY closely.
customer_reviews.author: Roan Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this is a quality set at all. I was very disappointed with the look of it. The teal color is very muted and almost dingy looking in real. The photos make them look so much more appealing than what they are in real life. Returning and paying the $20 shipping charge because they frankly look cheap and awful and I would rather get a better set with the same money.
customer_reviews.author: KarinaH

customer_reviews.title: Luggage seems nice
customer_reviews.text: So I just received my luggage today, my initial thoughts are that it seems to be a nice set. However two things that I have some concern is one my 28” luggage came with a massive scratch across the font of it, the other is that when you open the cases the lids seem very flexible & maybe not that durable, not like traditional luggage of past time where the lids seem more solid. The durability while traveling I can’t comment on until I use them. So far it seems okay. I will be writing another review after I get back from my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Francine Reed

customer_reviews.title: It's going to look really beat up quickly.. rethink this.
customer_reviews.text: One trip across the pond and this looks like I pulled it out of a dumpster. :( . I like the design just wish it was more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ola Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great set and value!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love these! They aren't SUPER durable and will scratch. However fabulous value and easy to use as well as drag along! Perfect for traveling in a vehicle, have not used on a flight so I can not review for that purpose. Very roomy, and the smallest is PERFECT for absolutely everything needed for bathroom stuff, makeup, hairdryer, and much more! Very pleased with this purchase. Also they fit well in suitcase protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Don't Buy it if you are a frequent flyer. The set Fell apart on the first family travel. Pieces and Wells falling, Scratches. It Looks great when It gets out of the box.!
customer_reviews.author: Vinicius

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but scratch easily
customer_reviews.text: I really like these suitcases. They can fit a lot of my stuff, are very light weight, and the materials used are very nice. The only drawback is the outside is easily scratched and scuffed up. As we all know, commercial flights are not the most gentle when it comes to the passengers' suitcases, the workers just flinging them onto conveyor belts and such. Due to this, my suitcases have several large scratches after a flight to New York.
customer_reviews.author: Ace 0820

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage set!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the set not to mention the price! I shopped at Walmart for the same style of luggage which one piece would have cost $80 for the 28” one, $70 for a 24” size then there wasn’t even a carry on at all. I think this is such a great deal for a 3 piece set, not to mention all the color choices!
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Looking
customer_reviews.text: So cute and I love how they look so elegant but very affordable. I was disappointed when I used them and they got scratched up so easy though. I think they need some type of coating to keep them from being scratch right away.
customer_reviews.author: Sybs65

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how long it will last
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and how well they move. I also like the way the inner compartment is setup and how lightweight they are. So far so good but I have only traveled once with these. I checked a bag and it did get scuffed but that’s to be expected so no biggie. I’m not sure how long these will hold up but I’ve got 4 more trips this year so if anything changes I’ll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: C.J.

customer_reviews.title: They seem very sturdy and put together well
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved my suitcases and am very impressed with them. They seem very sturdy and put together well. The ice blue color is not as vibrant as I had hoped, but otherwise it seems to be a pretty solid piece of luggage. We will see how it holds up when I take it through the airport and on a cruise this winter though!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my daughter who is in college. She used the set to travel back and forth to school this summer. She used it only twice and the larger one got a bit marked up/scratched going through baggage handling. A couple of the caps from the wheels have popped of (can be popped back on) but all in all she is very happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Look nice, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in time for Christmas well packaged. Color is spot on, look real nice and surprisingly light weight. That should allow for my wife to bring two extra outfits and shoes. Sides are a little more flexible than I had anticipated. Haven't had a chance to go anywhere yet, but it should be easy to spot these babies on the airport luggage carousel.
customer_reviews.author: MrMike

customer_reviews.title: Worse than expected
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a try despite the bad reviews, and regret it! The outside shell of the luggage was so soft that it seemed like anything that touches it leaves scratches! Handle got stuck! All this on our first trip. You get what you pay for. Sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broken
customer_reviews.text: I was studying abroad and needed durable luggage to safely transport my belongings from country to country. Long story short, I went to pick up my luggage at the airport and the zipper ripped on one of them. Someone who worked at the airport aggressively taped it together so I wouldn’t lose my belongings. The rest of my traveling experience was impacted by this because I had no way to transport my clothes. I’m really disappointed by this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Meri

customer_reviews.title: Can be easily identified with unique design
customer_reviews.text: I bought these last minute mainly for the color and the price. They are super lightweight, when packed full my 3 year old could easily maneuver the largest one, she had the medium sized one for our trip. There are little reflective triangles on each suitcase in the corner. At the airport the suitcases from our flight were on a different conveyor belt and I easily spotted mine across the way because the light reflected off the triangle. It scratches easily but what suitcase doesn’t? No dents or major harm to the suitcases. I’m extremely happy with my last minute suitcase buy.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have been traveling while a lot recently and my luggage has taken a beating. It holds up really well. Thre only issue I have with this are the caps attached to the wheels. Some have come off but the wheels have been fine. Overall, I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Frisian

customer_reviews.title: I like this luggage it’s well built sturdy and looks good ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this luggage it’s well built sturdy and looks good it does scratch easily however I have used all three several times in the last month and so far so good it’s hiling up. Great for value for the cost
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the color choices and look of this 3-pack luggage set. It is very easy to roll around in any direction and I love how the inside helps to keep things where they should be with the extra compartment zipper. My one piece of luggage was damaged during my first flight with it and the customer service team at Coolife was so patient, quick and helpful with giving me options to rectify my (now unusable) piece of luggage. I definitely recommend this company and this luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and seems ok for travel
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set but have not had a chance to use them since right after the pandemic happened. The packaging was ok but box was all dented. They are pretty and seems like great traveling luggage.
customer_reviews.author: HotSauce

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this luggage for my daughter’s birthday. We took a trip together & she used it for the first time! She loved everything about it, the color, the durability, the design & interior!
customer_reviews.author: S. Barretth

customer_reviews.title: Best luggage set ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This set rules!!! Had to go on a business trip and this was hands down the best purchase I have ever made. If you pack the large one just make sure you can lift it into your rental car.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Harris

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: This set was purchased for my 16 year old granddaughter's birthday. She picked it out and I ordered. When all three cases are inside of the other, the set is rather heavy but it is a good product and should last her a very long time. She is very happy with the set!
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage Set that Doesn't Break the Bank
customer_reviews.text: Love this luggage set!! Travel a 3-5 times a year both domestic and International. Never had an issue with this luggage durable and easy to spot at pick up. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AsianMan12

customer_reviews.title: Cool blue color and sturdy suitcases
customer_reviews.text: Big fan. Gifted these to my sister and they are sturdy and have survived numerous train trips, sprints through the station, stairs etc. love the ice blue color too
customer_reviews.author: Maya H.

customer_reviews.title: Ready for my Trip
customer_reviews.text: Just received my luggage, but have not used it of yet. Our trip in December, on our way to Hawaii, will let you know when we return. Great price on the luggage and was packaged very well, Great job!
customer_reviews.author: WALTER C.

customer_reviews.title: Warranty necessary
customer_reviews.text: They move swiftly, but after only one domestic flight. The rim of one of the spinners has disappeared. It doesn’t impact movement, but is terrible for aesthetics. I would like to know if a replacement rim piece can be sent out.
customer_reviews.author: AHall

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved the lookout these and was so excited to use them. Then when my husband went to put them away in the closet, they brushed against the wood molding and got scratches, totally ruining the look. He wasn’t being rough with them. It makes me think they scratch easily. I am dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Great for saving space
customer_reviews.text: Great suitcases. Love how they all fit inside one another for storage. Saves a lot of space in our tiny home. Light weight. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very nice style and good maneuverability.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it was lightweight and has easy maneuverability. I had one little issue,but they reached out to me and.went out of their way to make sure I was satisfied. I was very impressed!! You can bet that when I need to buy more luggage, it will be Coolife Luggage. I am very grateful and impressed with the service they provided. Thank you Coolife.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Dodder

customer_reviews.title: Quality luggage at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: My one big problem was unpacking the two boxes that contained the luggage. I finally did get help. I am, however, quite pleased with the 3 suitcases. And, yes they do all fit together easily.
customer_reviews.author: JMG

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, not to pleased with the durability
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love how elegant this set looks! Only thing that bothers me is they are super soft. I used my set to go out of town for my grandmother's funeral, and there are so many scratches and even a massive dent in the medium sized piece, that looks like if it will turn into a complete hole, if anything touches it. So definitely worried about that.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It easy to move around on any surface, the shell hold up well to the toughness of airport personnel, and it holds a fantastic amount! Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle

customer_reviews.title: Check the inside thoroughly!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute...love the color. I haven’t used it yet will be using it this Thursday...I noticed when I was packing yesterday that the seam is coming apart on was side already. Too late to return it. Didn’t think to examine thoroughly once I opened it or I would have exchanged it. Hopefully it will not get worse in the trip. May change my rating after this trip.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: A lot thinner than I expected but otherwise meets my expectations. Haven't used them yet but will update after I do.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Great quality great price
customer_reviews.text: This is really very easy to pack and pull! Nice unusual color should make for an easy find on the conveyor belt!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Krause

customer_reviews.title: Great set of luggage!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my 3 piece set. It’s sturdy but doesn’t weigh a lot. The wheels roll easily. Will be taking a trip soon and can’t wait to see how well it holds up. Definitely worth the price. I expected to pay much more for a set of this quality.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Worst experience ever !!!
customer_reviews.text: Scratched up after one trip, the luggage looks old. 1/5 stars Second trip completely broken. Use the set two times. Was gone for only 5 days. Worst purchase ever !!! Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: lulu_Bella

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and sturdy durable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and easy to use. very light weight Round trip flight 3000 miles and then took a cruise and they worked great on both round trips.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price.Ive gotten frequent use out of these since purchasing. Color is really pretty in person but does show any TSA heavy handling scuff marks easily. I’m not one to shrink wrap my luggage so I just except to expect it.Aside from them looking a little scratched up after a few flights these were I great purchase and I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Muscat

customer_reviews.title: They are alright.
customer_reviews.text: You are getting what you pay for LOL. The 3 pieces are pretty great for $120. However , they are not “scratch proof”. Bought this set for a Valentines trip to Baltimore and they have a fair amount of scratches on them now after the trip. The zippers also don’t seem very durable so don’t pack to heavy. It is cool though that they all fit inside each other for storage so that’s a plus.
customer_reviews.author: StrawberryDoll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product Perfect Price
customer_reviews.text: If anyone is pondering on whether or not to purchase this luggage, please take my advice and purchase! This luggage is durable , light weight and maneuverable. Purchase now!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bosslady Bostick

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It was a gd but it was the only ones tht delivered promptly bt the durability is nt so gd
customer_reviews.author: Ticana1

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable luggage set
customer_reviews.text: Color was very nice and easy to spot at the airports. Made it thru trip to China and back. Pleased with purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage set. Easy color to spot on the luggage carousel. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking lightweight set, but can be easily scratched.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and is easy to spot. All sizes fit into each other. Lightweight. They're not expandable. Also, keep in mind that they can easily be scratched and actually came scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Woods

customer_reviews.title: Elegant luggage
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased based on a recommendation. The color was chosen because it is unique and easily identifiable. It has an elegant appearance and I can’t wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be very good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't traveled with it yet so don't know how it will hold up but seems to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Color is a little darker and a bit dim, but happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Aml0287

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well, has lots of space, very light weight and rolls smoothly
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE !!
customer_reviews.text: This luggage is SUPER lightweight and i love it!! Can’t wait to put it to good use!
customer_reviews.author: Briana Knowling

customer_reviews.title: Survives rough baggage handlers
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage if you travel a lot like I do. Had some rough baggage handlers last trip and even though the luggage was banged up everything inside was well protected. I would suggest a dark color because the lighter color shows all the scrapes and dings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage
customer_reviews.text: Love my new luggage! Such a pretty color! Rolls like a dream. So smooth! Sturdy luggage. Love the TSA locks. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Aguiniga

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight set with easy spin 360 wheels. Very impressive size and finish. Thrilled to go on our first trip with them soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for? Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Already scratched after initial open the main problem with this set is how thin they are. It’s almost as if they are disposable after one use. Not sure why all the good reviews? A tad puzzling. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Blair

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy
customer_reviews.text: I loved the mobility, but hate the fact that they scratched up after only one flight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Good for my needs. Scratched a bit on the first trip, but I love the easy to use locks and they hold a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy411

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage’s
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my daughter. She loved the color and felt it was a good quality set of luggage
customer_reviews.author: jazzyboots

customer_reviews.title: Good Luggage for a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: The luggage surface scratches easily and the smallest luggage set of the three is pretty small. That being said, it forces me to pack more sensibly and winds up being SO much easier when on the plane! Love the luggage for the price! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rock

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Crafted with Care and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This luggage v read do much more then I could ever bargain for! Sleek and very deluxe feeling. The packaging and care instructions were so very well put together!!! Helps you to feel that c your living a very Cool-Life of the Fly!!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Universal Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Light scratches after travel, still looks good. Easy to travel with, out of country and back. No problems with TSA or customs. Stores easily one inside each other.
customer_reviews.author: crazy4jewels.star

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I just got these, and so far they look great, easy to move, and are spacious! I also love the 3-digit number code, and it was easy to set up. They seem like they will be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Boni Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good but the zipper broke hours after I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Margreta SKEETE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set of luggage
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set of luggage. Love the color, maneuverability, locks...everything about this set it lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great look but shallow
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and easily handled but once packed with packing cubes they were real heavy and they were shallow, didn't expect that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the low price
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from our trip and they still move smooth and turned beautifully. Bad part is they do scuff easy and you know TSA don’t give 2 poos about your luggage. They will take their anger out on it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sturdy set!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, love the color and items were packaged well so arrived with no dents, scratches or other damage.
customer_reviews.author: Parrington

customer_reviews.title: Durable set
customer_reviews.text: I love the teal color. The luggage was durable & light-weight. However, after first time use, it was scratched up really bad. Not sure if the baggage handlers were too aggressive or if luggage just scratches too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Perfect luggage set!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this set! Lots of space, easy to pull around, lightweight just to name a few great qualities!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great luggage set . bought this for a trip to Thailand. Held up extremely well
customer_reviews.author: Robert Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Not as shiny as photo shows
customer_reviews.text: Not as shiny and metallic as shown in photos - color is very dull
customer_reviews.author: Define Deplorable

customer_reviews.title: Superior luggage for price
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight suitcases. Wheels glide very easily. Some of the best luggage I’ve ever had. Money well spent. The only downsides are that the zippers catch pretty often and the paint peels/scratches very, very, very so be careful checking these luggage in.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: My, my, Coolife
customer_reviews.text: My wife fell in love with this immediately and asked why I did not buy TWO sets. But she had not asked. Its so stylish, elegant and compares with any other I have ever bought/used, and at XX years I have used a few. Rolls with ease and you feel good moving it around at the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Coonier MeChaie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for 3 peices of luggage. Was worried about the thinnest of the walls but it has held up great on several planes and a cruise. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: When they return from there trip I will give you an up date on how there luggage made it out .
customer_reviews.text: Hi . It was a gift to my niece and her sweet hubby for there Anniversary . They have a trip coming up in September to New York . they were so excited when they recieved it and Loved there Luggage’s & the color wine very much and said how they can’t wait in using them soon .
customer_reviews.author: Sue A.

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what we wanted for a gift, reading the reviews the zippers tend to be a problem. We have passed on the information and hopefully they will treat them accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Moves swiftly
customer_reviews.text: Look nice bought them for a Christmas gift, may need to buy myself a a pair
customer_reviews.author: DWAYNE

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for travel, marks a little, durable so far
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Burton

customer_reviews.title: scratches
customer_reviews.text: this luggage in the first trip, the luggage was scratches, bad material
customer_reviews.author: Gloribeth Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Broken reset button on lock.
customer_reviews.text: One of my brand new suitcases wont reset so I can use my new code. Glad the zipper wasn't connected or I couldn't get into my suitcase. Other then that it's a nice set. Nice color and smooth rolling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wheels break easily and aren't replaceable
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for first trip until the wheel busted and apparently I can't get it replaced. Wouldnt recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Okay Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to receive this luggage, the zipper is kid of a lousy quality and it’s stretched without over packing my luggage the luggage boy also dented very easily
customer_reviews.author: mayeli rico

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with quality thus far!
customer_reviews.text: Going on Vacation in a couple of weeks. I’ll update if there’s any problems, but so far the quality seems pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Harden

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight hope everything fits in them and hope they role better then my old set
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!! Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Luggage was larger and nicer than I was expecting for the price. Very happy with this buy, also the color was very easy to pick out at the airport. Would recommend this product for anyone to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: The added locks that came built in had me sold
customer_reviews.text: much upgraded suitcase over my previous one, very durable and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of luggage!! Very durable so nothing gets damaged. They fit inside of each other when not in use so they are easy to store. Very easy to maneuver and rolls across any surface easily.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The room and space in the suit case
customer_reviews.text: This luggage is absolutely amazing it has more than enough room that you can use only 1 suitcase for travel out of the country
customer_reviews.author: De'Anna Nicholas

product_meta.title: Coolife Luggage 3 Piece Sets PC+ABS Spinner Suitcase 20 inch 24 inch 28 inch
feature_bullets: Worldwide 2 year warranty. Three piece luggage in one set with 20 inch, 24 inch, 28 inch upright, which can be stored one into another.

Durable and lighter PC+ABS hard shell material, brings together the advantages of both materials. The surface features grinding process to keep your luggage as brightness as new. It also eliminates the trouble of the protective film can’t be peeled off thoroughly.
An adjustable 3-step telescoping handle allow you to maneuver in tight spaces and provide effortless movement; multi-directional silent Spinner wheels and secure TSA-Accepted Lock.
The unique irregular design of the surface makes your luggage stand out.
Top-notch and fully-lined interior with multi-use pockets to make your small value essentials well organized.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars429 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
